name: Bare Knuckle Sandwich Test Demo
description:
PLEASE FILL OUT OUR SURVEY: https://forms.gle/Wvf6XKnR2cku9mgx7

Bare Knuckle Sandwich is a 2D Punch-Out style fighting game with a narrative. Set in an alternate near future, the game tells the story of a young, directionless, guy who joins an underground bare-knuckle boxing ring.

This is an early alpha test build designed to give a sample of the combat and get feedback surrounding the mechanics currently in place. 

To navigate menus use your mouse.

Full screen and audio settings are available in the Options menu.
